title: Honey CRM
excerpt: Rebuilt Honey CRM's (Now Glass Hive) website in React with Gatsby.js and Netlify CMS. This is still a live project and they have made some changes since I left.

title: Caption Calculator
excerpt: A tool for customers to calculate the number of captioning minutes they would need to purchase for their programs.

title: Get Page Images
excerpt: A chrome extension that, when run, grabs all images on the page, opens a new page, displays the images, and allows the user to easily download them by clicking on each image. (Still under review in the store, so now published yet.)

title: Aircraft Comparison Tool
excerpt: A tool, similar to Apple's iphone comparison tool, that allows customers to compare up to three aircraft at a time (Total Passengers, Max Cruise Speed, Cabin Length, ect). This tool might not be live yet, depending on when you see this, so the 'view project' link might not work.

title: SynthDigital
excerpt: Rebuilt SynthDigital's website in React with Gatsby.js and Netlify CMS.

title: RedRock
excerpt: This is a site I built during my time at TRIDigital for a company called RedRock IS. I built this site using Wordpress, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I also used a few plugins to help with the functionality of the site. This is still a live site and they have made very minor changes since I developed it.

title: Compass MPS
excerpt: This is a site I built during my time at TRIDigital for a company called Compass MSP. I built this site using Wordpress, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I also used a few plugins to help with the functionality of the site. The site is active, but they have made changes to it after I left, so take it with a grain of salt.

title: GoodReads Clone
excerpt: A book organization app (Similar to Google's GoodReads) built with React and Redux during my React Nano Degree program at Udacity.

title: React ToDo App
excerpt: A MERN stack ToDo list app and an API (https://github.com/ghughes13/API)  that will store your ToDo list items in a MongoDB database. There is no current demo for this project, and it needs to be redeployed.

title: Would You Rather
excerpt: A would you rather game app built with React and Redux during my rect nano degree program at Udacity.

title: Tic-Tak-Toe
excerpt: A Tic-Tak-Toe app built with vanilla JavaScript, CSS and HTML

title: Paginating List
excerpt: A quick view of industry specific problems solved with design by the awesome team at Keystroke.

title: TRIDigital
excerpt: Rebuilt TRIDigital's website in React with Gatsby.js and Netlify CMS. (No longer active site)
